DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the single-dose pharmacokinetics of tenofovir alafenamide (TAF) and it's metabolite tenofovir (TFV) along with the safety and tolerability of TAF in participants with normal hepatic function and severe hepatic impairment.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics of Tenofovir Alafenamide in Adults With Normal Hepatic Function and Severe Hepatic Impairment
